name: Unfamiliar Ritual
description:
This game originated from Unfamiliar Room. It has the same mechanism with Unfamiliar Room, but it has a different atmosphere. The feel of control changes constantly in this game.

|How to Play|

・A, S, D, F keys : add power, and various other actions; move giant's hands and feet

・arrow keys : move the small characters

・esc key : quit the game

*descriptions also appear on screen
